src_original: namas- ratna-trayāya /  namas- āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahā-karuṇikāya /  tat- yathā sāde sāde /  sidi sidi /  sudu sudu svāhā /
namas-\var{nama\lem \em;  namaḥ \cod\Dutt} atīta-anāgata-pratyutpa[nnebhyaḥ]\var{missing in Chinese 1071} sarva-tathāgatebhyas- arhadbhyaḥ samyak-saṃbuddhebhyaḥ /
oṃ diri diri\var{diri diri\lem \em;  dhara dhara dhiri dhiri \Dutt from Tib} /  dhuru dhuru /
[kusume]\var{kusume\em supplied from Tib also in Chinese} kusumavare /
tat- yathā ha ha ha ha\var{ha ha ha ha\lem \cod;
hā [hā hā] hā \Dutt} /  ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
